backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing schools, teachers, trainings, reviews, and blog posts with access control and demo data seeding on upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI banner update requirements tied to SchoolProfileBanner.tsx with metadata and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing many frontend pages, components, hooks, and styles used in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and global background/foreground rules including dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root div and loading main.tsx for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React entry component configuring TanStack Router routes, QueryClient, theming, layout, and top-level providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Admin access wrapper handling Internet Identity login/logout and gating admin content with status UI and fallback card.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard tabs for managing schools, teachers, trainings, and reviews using section components.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/R: Displays all reviews with school lookup, loading state, and delete confirmation using admin review hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/S: Manages school records with create, edit, and delete dialogs using admin school mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/T: Lists teachers and provides creation and deletion with school selection and admin teacher hooks.
Handles listing, creation, and deletion of training programs, validating hours and associating them with schools.
frontend/src/components/common/CopyLinkB: Button that copies a provided or current URL to clipboard with success/error toasts and state feedback.
frontend/src/components/common/SocialLin: Renders a row of external social link icons after filtering out invalid links.
frontend/src/components/directory/Direct: Static informational sections explaining how the directory works and its benefits using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/directory/School: Displays a school card with thumbnail, location, trainings, teacher count, and a button to view details.
frontend/src/components/directory/Teache: Renders a list of teachers with avatars, names, and specializations, or a placeholder if none exist.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with about text, navigation links, social links, and branding information.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header containing logo, navigation links, social links, theme toggling, and a mobile dropdown menu.
frontend/src/components/routing/RouterEr: Error fallback UI showing an error message and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/school/AboutScho: Displays an about section for a school with provided or autogenerated description text.
frontend/src/components/school/faqConten: Defines an FAQ item type and exports a default list of school-related FAQ entries.
frontend/src/components/school/FAQSectio: Shows an accordion-based FAQ list for a school.
frontend/src/components/school/ImageGall: Image gallery with clickable thumbnails that open a modal viewer with larger images.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolInq: Contact form component with validation, submission simulation, and success alert for school inquiries.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolMap: Displays a Google Maps embed and link based on a provided location, with fallback when location is missing.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolPro: Renders a scrollable banner image gallery with pagination, keyboard navigation, and fallback image handling.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolRev: Fetches and displays school reviews, shows average rating, and includes an authenticated review submission form.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolTra: Lists training courses with metadata and navigation to course details, including an explore-scroll interaction.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolVid: Embeds a YouTube video extracted from various URL formats or shows a placeholder if unavailable.
frontend/src/components/school/SimilarSc: Loads and displays similar schools with skeleton loading and fallback when none are found.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Defines a social link type and provides default social link configurations with placeholder URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminReviews: Provides hooks to fetch all reviews across schools for admins and a placeholder mutation for deleting reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminSchools: Provides admin hooks to list, create, update, and delete schools with backend error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminTeacher: Provides admin hooks to load teachers across schools and perform create/delete operations with validation and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminTrainin: Provides admin hooks to load, create, and delete trainings across schools while handling backend errors and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Provides hooks to load all blog posts or a single post using the backend actor with error logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for managing login, identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolCardData.ts: Fetches a school's trainings and teachers using React Query and returns loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolDetails.ts: Retrieves full school details, teachers, and trainings with combined loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolReviews.ts: Loads reviews for a school and provides a mutation to submit new reviews with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchools.ts: Fetches all schools, optionally loads trainings, and filters them by selected training hours with error diagnostics.
Retrieves schools filtered by country, state, and city with backend error logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimilarSchools.ts: Computes similar schools by comparing training hours and returns top matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrainingCurriculum: Fetches a specific school and training for curriculum views with loading and error aggregation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, variables, dark mode theme, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Provides structured logging, error normalization, and nonâ€‘fatal error detection for backend calls.
frontend/src/lib/blogContent.ts: Utilities for generating excerpts, splitting blog content into paragraphs, and selecting display excerpts.
frontend/src/lib/curatedSchoolMedia.ts: Returns curated thumbnails and gallery images for specific schools, currently supporting Vinyasa Yogashala.
frontend/src/lib/locationFormat.ts: Formats structured location fields, sanitizes segments, and checks for structured location availability.
frontend/src/lib/locationRoutes.ts: Builds encoded location routes and generates breadcrumb paths for structured locations.
frontend/src/lib/schoolThumbnails.ts: Provides deterministic thumbnail selection for school IDs using a simple hash and fallback image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with mission details, feature cards, and placeholder descriptive content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Wraps the admin dashboard in an authentication gate using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Displays blog post list with loading, error, empty states, and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a single blog post with loading/error handling and paragraph formatting.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact information section and placeholder non-functional contact form.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Displays a yoga school directory with filters, hero section, and scroll-to interactions.
frontend/src/pages/LocationListingPage.t: Renders a location-based listing of schools with loading, error, and empty states, using decoded URL parameters to fetch and display schools.
frontend/src/pages/SchoolDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full school profile with banner, sections, gallery, reviews, and inquiry form, handling loading, error, and breadcrumb logic.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitClaimSchoolPage: Static informational page explaining how to submit or claim a school, with disabled buttons for future functionality.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingCurriculumPag: Shows detailed training curriculum information for a specific school, with navigation, loading/error states, and course details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins used across the frontend.
project_state.json: Configuration file capturing project version, goals, architecture notes, known issues with school/blog loading, and existing feature metadata for the Yoga Schools Directory.
